text: .  We may use the information you provide during registration with us to monitor the proper usage of our Website, including detecting, investigating and preventing activities that may violate our policies or applicable laws.
Further, no mobile information will be shared with third parties for their direct marketing purposes.

This Privacy Notice discloses the practices of NWN Corporation and Carousel Industries of North America, LLC (collectively, "NWN Carousel" or "we") concerning information we obtain by and through your use of the NWN Carousel websites (collectively, the "Website") and our technology solutions (collectively, the "Services").
If you are located in the EEA, please note that as part of our service, we may transfer your personal information to other regions, including to the United States.
